hcc_text: Hamilton Avenue is in the middle third in Brooklyn for pedestrian deaths and serious injuries per mile.
info: At Hamilton Avenue at Bqe Eb En Hamilton Avenue Sb, Gowanus Exwy Wb En Hamilton Avenue and Columbia Street, there was 1 severe injury in crashes between 2008 and 2012.
intersection: Hamilton Avenue at Bqe Eb En Hamilton Avenue Sb, Gowanus Exwy Wb En Hamilton Avenue and Columbia Street
